name: Current & Forecast Weather
description: Provide accurate, real-time current weather conditions and detailed forecasts (hourly, daily) for user-selected locations.

name: Location Management & Personalization
description: Enable users to easily manage multiple locations, detect their current location, and personalize settings such as units and notification preferences.

name: Advanced Weather Visualizations
description: Offer interactive visual representations of weather data, including radar maps, precipitation forecasts, and historical trends.

name: Proactive Alerts & Notifications
description: Deliver timely and relevant weather alerts, severe weather warnings, and customizable daily forecast notifications.

name: User Experience & Performance
description: Ensure a fast, intuitive, and visually appealing user interface that provides a seamless experience across mobile devices.
